title: Peer Review-Based Online Course Quality Management Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience operating online learning platforms and foundational instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability of professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to evaluate online courses from a student perspective

learning_goals: The alignment between learning objectives and assessments in online courses can be analyzed using the peer review process.
Learners can identify three or more issues related to content organization, interactive elements, and technical accessibility based on Quality Matters (QM) standards compliance criteria.
Learners can systematically document improvement recommendations according to feedback writing guidelines.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
